title: Oru Malai Pozhuthil Lyrics Theneer Viduthi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Singer : Sona Mohabatra
Song : Oru Malai Pozhuthil
Lyrics :  Na Muthukumar
Music  SS Kumaran

Oru Malai Pozhuthil, nan unnai parthaen
Unnai parthe, anbe nan ennai parthaen
Urangaamal, unnai kangiren.. oh ..
unnakaaga uyir vazhgiren.. oh...

Oru Malai Pozhuthil, nan unnai parthaen
Unnai parthe, anbe nan ennai parthaen

Adhikaalai ninaivugal azhaikum
Anaiyamal nerupena kodhikkum
Un kadhal nyabaga mazhai vandhu anaikum
Adangatha aasaigal irukkum
Aanalum mounangal thadukkum
En kadhal nadhiyil ilai-ena thavikkum ...
Idhuthaan uyir kadhala, uyiril varum modhala
Nenje naanulla varayil
unnai sumapen idhayathin arayil
Oru Malai Pozhuthil, nan unnai parthaen ..

Ennai thaedi ther vandha velai
Vazhi mari ponadhu paathai
Puriyamal kannanai pirindhaal Raadhai
Idi modhi idhayathil vaarthai,
idhudhaano kadhalin geethai
Varuven un gokula thotathil naalai
Medhuvaai ennai varudavaa
thottu muzhudhai ennai thirudavaa

neethan en uyir neethan
Ini neethan en uyir neethan

Oru Malai Pozhuthil, nan unnai parthaen
Unnai parthe, anbe nan ennai parthaen
